title: So smooth!
summary:
Rize Ads, a premium affiliate network, works as a middleman for people who want to sell things online and those who want to advertise. They help them connect quickly on platforms like Facebook and Google Ads for good results. The platform has all the tools needed, including AI and automatic searches to make things easy for sellers.



This summer, Rize Ads introduced something neat called a "dedicated advertising budget" that is expected to help sellers save money and focus more on getting good results, giving them extra support to do well without spending too much. But how does it work exactly and what are the benefits?
strength:
In the realm of Rize Ads, a hub for online selling, affiliates (sellers) and advertisers (promoters) access a toolkit of features. They can integrate with platforms like Facebook and Google Ads, leverage AI for refined ads, and utilize essential tools.Notably, the platform efficiently identifies suitable partners or offers, eliminating the need for extensive searches and negotiations.



Financial management poses a challenge, particularly in the domain of affiliate marketing.
weakness:
In the realm of Rize Ads, a hub for online selling, affiliates (sellers) and advertisers (promoters) access a toolkit of features. They can integrate with platforms like Facebook and Google Ads, leverage AI for refined ads, and utilize essential tools.Notably, the platform efficiently identifies suitable partners or offers, eliminating the need for extensive searches and negotiations.

title: Game-changer for our Customer Service Teams!
summary:
As the Co-Founder and CEO of a customer service company with 13 years of experience in the delivery of exceptional customer experience, I can confidently say that CoSupport’s AI has truly been a game-changer for us.

It took less than a month to integrate CoSupport Agent with our QCRM system and our agents' workflow, and in that time we’ve already started seeing results.
For us, this meant a huge reduction in overall time spent on communication, all while keeping that human touch and customer care we’re proud of.
strength:
What truly piqued my interest is their business intelligence tool available right in our Slack workspace. It’s got deep knowledge of our company and our operating procedures.
As I travel a lot, I personally use it to brainstorm business ideas on the go right from my phone.
weakness: Like with any IT product, there is always room for improvement, however, the current functionality goes beyond our needs. And any potential enhancements the guys from CoSupport will make in the future would simply be the icing on the cake.
position: BizDev at CoSupport AI ⚡ | Creating Business Value with the power of AI
